meta.notes: Positions are explicit objects with index. Field names align with app data model.

energy_mix.name: Energy Mix Spread
energy_mix.purpose: Use this spread to understand the dynamics of energy in a relationship or interaction.

positions.meaning: The energy, attitude, or input the user brings into the interaction
The energy, attitude, or input the 3rd party brings into the interaction
The interplay of energies between the user and the 3rd party
Conclusion, or a hint on to how to best handle the interaction

diamond_spread.name: Diamond Spread
diamond_spread.purpose: Use this spread to gain an overview of a given situation.

positions.meaning: Describes the subject or the current situation of the user
Internal influences acting on the user or the situation
External influences acting on the user or the situation
The solution, or what is needed to achieve resolution or success
The outcome after the solution has been applied

two_paths.name: Two Paths Spread
two_paths.purpose: Use this spread to choose between two options by comparing their benefits, drawbacks, and likely outcomes.

positions.meaning: The current state of the user
The pros for choice A
The cons for choice A
The likely outcome of choice A
The pros for choice B
The cons for choice B
The likely outcome of choice B
Conclusion, or a hint on to how to best make a choice
